title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127, when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label.
EB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the close button should remain aligned with the label.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to be smaller.
3. Observe if the close button remains aligned with the label.
